name: ant hill

exits.description: The hike back to the dirt hill is to much for you. You can't go this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You head to a new room that seems to transition slowly from outside to inside.
You can not head this direction.
You can not go this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You can not head this direction.
You see the clear blue sky and the sun. You can not head this direction.

problemDescription: Solve this problem to get the magic powder.
description: The walk was exhausting but you finally made it.  You are at the deserted ant hill and you decide to go inside ant take a look around. You walk through what feels like a maze of tunnels and finally you reach it. What you assume used to be the queen ants den. There you find a pile of magic powder but in order to take a handful you must answer a question then you can put it into your pocket. You find your way out and continue on your journey.
